FuncDef: This command defines the amount of time the service manager will keep the local sites in standby status, waiting for BGP updates from remote PEs before running the DF election algorithm to decide whether the site should be unblocked. The timer is started when one of the following events occurs if the site is operationally up:

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the standby status in seconds. Values-0 to 100. ParamDefault: Default- 2
